definition: parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: Oh, she so reminds me of her mother.
sentences.chinese: 哦，她還長得真像她親媽。

sentences.english: Since then, he has cared for her as if she were his own mother.
sentences.chinese: 從那以後，他就把她當作自己的親媽那樣照顧。
